definitions.definition: The act of publicly reciting something previously memorized .
A regularly scheduled class , in a school , in which discussion occurs of the material covered in a parallel lecture .
A reiteration; a setting down, e.g. for ease of reference, of something previously established.
A part of a song's lyrics that is spoken rather than sung.

main_definition: The act of publicly reciting something previously memorized .
secondary_definitions: A regularly scheduled class , in a school , in which discussion occurs of the material covered in a parallel lecture .
A reiteration; a setting down, e.g. for ease of reference, of something previously established.
( music ) A part of a song's lyrics that is spoken rather than sung.
